Venus.Named: Roman goddess of love and beauty.
Venus.Discovered: Known to the ancients and visible to the naked eye.
Venus.Atmosphere Comp: 96% Carbon Dioxide, 3% Nitrogen, 1% Other Gases, Contains clouds of sulfuric acid.
Venus.Satellites: Venus has no orbiting celestial bodies
Venus.Visited: Mariner 2, 5, 10, Venera 4-16, Pioneer Venus Oribiter, Multiprobe, Vega 1-2, Galileo, Magelian, Cassini, Venus Express, MESSENGER, Akatsuki, IKAROS
